name: Space Pirate (Freezex)
description:
You wake up aboard a strange spaceship you've never seen before. You notice it is quickly running out of power. You need to steal enemy power and upgrade your own ship to have any chance of surviving. But wait, what is that big ship in the distance? I bet that one has tons of power...

Controls:

Forward: W or UP arrow

Rotate: A and D or Left and Right arrows

Shoot: Space
